WELCOME

In our 25 years of working in the industry, we have worked with a lot of customers, from individual, freelance painter to families and large companies. We primarily sell Jotun paints, and the necessary tools for painting. We also give free consultation on what paint would suit you the best. Furthermore, we can provide you with expert painters that we have known for decades.

Jotun paints is an exquisite paint company, that only gives you a wide range of colors, but also design. You can always checkout those designs on their official website or in our shop.
